sentences.en: ...Jack Lang, France's minister for culture, and his deputy, Catherine Tasca.
sentences.cn: …法国文化部长杰克·朗和他的副手凯瑟琳·塔斯卡。

sentences.en: A deputy treasurer may be appointed if necessary.
sentences.cn: 必要时,可设副总会计师.

sentences.en: By convention the deputy leader was always a woman.
sentences.cn: 按惯例，这一领导职务的副职总是由女性担任。

sentences.en: He delegated his responsibilities to a deputy.
sentences.cn: 他把他的职责委托给了一位代理人.

sentences.en: He was nominally Deputy Prime Minister, certainly, but his influence was clearly on the wane.
sentences.cn: 当然，他名义上是副首相，但是显然他的影响力正在下降。

sentences.en: His brother was acting as his deputy in America.
sentences.cn: 他的兄弟充当他在美洲的代理人。

sentences.en: I decided to put in for a job as deputy secretary.
sentences.cn: 我决定申请副书记一职。

sentences.en: I delegated my responsibilities to my deputy.
sentences.cn: 我把职责委托给了我的代理人。

sentences.en: I'm acting as deputy till the manager returns.
sentences.cn: 我在经理回来之前代行他的职务。

sentences.en: Is this fair? Well, I put that question today to Deputy Counsel Craig Gillen.
sentences.cn: 这公平吗？我今天向副顾问克雷格·吉伦提出这个问题。

sentences.en: John will act as a deputy for me during my absence.
sentences.cn: 我离开期间,约翰将代理我的职务.

sentences.en: John will be my deputy while I am away.
sentences.cn: 我不在时,约翰将是我的代理人.

sentences.en: She is the deputy headmistress of the school.
sentences.cn: 她是那所学校的代理校长.

sentences.en: She was so disloyal to her deputy she made his position untenable.
sentences.cn: 她对她的副手很不守信义，使得他的职位岌岌可危。

sentences.en: The deputy chief inspector rang me up and said, "Miss Smith, you know you are due for a move?"
sentences.cn: 副总督察给我打电话说，“史密斯小姐，你知道你要搬家了吗？”

sentences.en: The deputy manager exchanged the company's interest for his personal honour.
sentences.cn: 这个代理经理为了个人荣誉而出卖了公司的利益.

sentences.en: the Deputy Secretary of State
sentences.cn: 助理国务卿

sentences.en: The manager's deputy filled in for her while she was off sick.
sentences.cn: 她生病不在期间,经理代理人临时代替了她.

sentences.en: the wardens of the forests performed important duties by deputy.
sentences.cn: 森林管理员通过代理人执行重要任务。

sentences.en: When the headmaster was away, the deputy head did his job.
sentences.cn: 当校长不在时, 代校长代理他的工作.

words.tran_cn: 委任；授权给；指定…为代理人
指定…为代理；授权…为代表

phrases.tran_cn: (史)由他人代理的；由他人代表的
副局长；副科长；副处长；副警长；副总警监

trans.tran_en: someone who is directly below another person in rank, and who is officially in charge when that person is not there
